article_node.title: Broncos edge rusher Nik Bonitto misses practice after bone spur procedure, expected back next week
article_node.summary: Broncos edge rusher Nik Bonitto missed practice as he recovers from foot surgery but is expected to return next week. Coach Sean Payton confirmed Bonitto's absence is due to a bone spur removal, not contract negotiations, as the team recently secured extensions for players Zach Allen and Courtland Sutton. Meanwhile, former rugby star Louis Rees-Zammit has signed with Bristol Bears after an 18-month stint in American football, and quarterbacks Bryce Young and C.J. Stroud reflected on their NFL journeys during a joint practice.
